hopobject.name: buyxM
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.12) Gecko/20101026 Firefox/3.6.12
hopobject.body:
Buy a BeagleBoard-xM

Come here for the latest availability information and list of distributors to buy a BeagleBoard-xM.

The Digi-Key order page went live on June 7th, 2010 and boards arrived at Digi-Key August 23rd. Boards are arriving at a rate of about 200 per week currently. The camera port is validated, but the picture quality still needs some improvements (software only updates required).

The export classification issue for orders outside of the United States and Canada currently seems to be resolved.

  • Digi-Key BeagleBoard-xM product purchase page
  • Farnell (UK)
  • IDA Systems (India)
  • Watterott (Germany)
  • Special Computing

Camera modules

Camera modules are available from Leopard Imaging.
